questions.question: How do I contact customer support if I have a question or issue?
questions.answer: You can reach our customer support team by emailing support@email.com or calling our toll-free number. We're here to assist you promptly.

questions.question: Can I return the product if it doesn't meet my expectations?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We offer a hassle-free return policy. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return the product within [number of days] days for a full refund or exchange.

questions.question: What makes your product stand out from others in the market?
questions.answer: Our product distinguishes itself through its adaptability, durability, and innovative features. We prioritize user satisfaction and continually strive to exceed expectations in every aspect.

props.heading: Common Questions
props.subheading: Find answers to frequently asked questions about our platform

questions.question: How does the free trial work?
questions.answer: Our 14-day free trial gives you full access to all features. No credit card required. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime during or after the trial period.

questions.question: Can I change my plan later?
questions.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate your billing accordingly.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption (AES-256), regular security audits, and are SOC 2 Type II certified. Your data is backed up daily and stored in secure, redundant data centers.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund within the first 30 days.
